message.body: Hey are you around the city at all? I need something out of Steves house and he said you have a key
About 6 months ago steve changed the locks on his doors so I actually do not have a key. Sorry. ...I'm also in harrisburg anyway.
sorry I couldn't help. I don't know why he told you that in the first place though. We just had the same problem of getting into his house the other day.
Yea I dunno that's weird. How'd you end up gettin in?
I don't know if he's still using it but there was a lock box in the backyard. it was before he left on his trip he's on.
Ok it's not a big deal, thanks anyway!
how long are you in town for? I could probably get you into his house when I get back.
Well I'm with my niece and nephew cause im watching them while my brother works on our house and we have no plan until 5:45 then I'm getting my bangs trimmed
Hmmm... Ok, well I'm getting home around 6 so if you want to get in there (or you wanna hang ) just give me a call anytime after that.
